name: auth
description: Hi Xin Ru (: Here's a quick reminder of a few things: - You will need to communicate with the frontend team to figure out what Auth API requests will be required - You can use Django or Express for this, use whichever you're more comfotable with - You should be able to set up the Django/Express project in this directory yourself, let us know if you need a hand - The database is intended to be written in postgres, but for now just focus on the database schema
